TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeNodeSelectAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the event or events to raise when a node in the control is selected.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control is set to a value other than an empty string (""), clicking the node navigates to the specified URL. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set to an empty string, clicking the node causes a postback. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property determines the events to raise on the postback. By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> event is raised. No events are raised if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to the None value.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the TreeNodeSelectAction enumeration to represent the event that is raised when a node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
[!code-cs[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_40_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_40_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction Expand = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Raises the event when a node is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction None = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Raises no events when a node is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction Select = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Raises the event when a node is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction SelectExpand = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Raises both the and events when a node is selected.
